navigationData.title: Navigation
navigationData.description:
Settings for the main navigation links like Home, Shop, etc.
Links used to construct navigation. (maxi menu and sidebar) - by default the 'Home' and 'Shop' links.

text.title: Text
text.description: Link's text shown in the UI

href.title: href
href.description: The href of the link - for example '/search' will go to the search results page. It's ignored for parent entries.  Also it could be an absolute URL like https://google.com but in that case, make sure you really need to break the single page application.

level.title: level
level.description: Hierarchy level of this navigation entry

dataTouchpoint.title: data-touchpoint
dataTouchpoint.description: data-touchpoint value for the link if any

dataHashtag.title: data-hashtag
dataHashtag.description: data-hashtag value for the link if any

classnames.title: class names
classnames.description: extra HTML class names to add to this entry

id.title: Id
id.description: Parent entries must have an id so children entries can reference it

parentId.title: Parent Id
parentId.description: If this is a child entry then this must be the id of the parent entry.

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Placeholder===Cateogries will be used to render the category menu at that place.
